channel.title: So many questions.. help me!
channel.description:
Im new to the whole moparscape thing but I have loads of questions.
1.How the heck do I even start a server which people play on??????
2.How do I edit what people have in there inventory if they just started????
3.How do I add commands? (exp.. ::starterkit to people who want a weapon set?)
4.How come when Im on moparscape 3.2, I log on then all my characters dissapear even after I click log out?
5.How do I get people in my server????

item.title: So many questions.. help me!
item.dc:creator: @zezuma zezuma
item.description:
@zezuma wrote:

1.How the heck do I even start a server which people play on???
you download a source in server downloads then run it… theres more but i cant reall explain

2.How do I edit what people have in there inventory if they just started???
idk

3.How do I add commands? (exp… ::starterkit to people who want a weapon set?)
you go to client.java then search tools. the under the } you can either change tools to whatever command you want and the tools to the items you want

4.How come when Im on moparscape 3.2, I log on then all my characters dissapear even after I click log out?
dont use hybris e.g. 127.0.0.1

5.How do I get people in my server???
you make a no-ip.

thats all i can tell you right now hope it helped

oh and find a TUT

Read full topic
